prompt: Create a privacy policy page with a dark blue background. Title 'Privacy Policy' at the top in bold white, centered. Back button in top-left. Intro paragraph in light gray below. Four sections: 'Data Collection', 'Data Use', 'Data Security', 'Contact Us' with light gray paragraphs. Use 24px padding, 32px spacing. Bottom has centered 'Accept' (light blue) and 'Decline' (outlined) buttons. Scrollable with Column layout.
flutter_code:
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class GeneratedWidget extends StatelessWidget {
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return Scaffold(
      backgroundColor: Colors.blue[900],
      appBar: AppBar(
        backgroundColor: Colors.blue[900],
        elevation: 0,
        leading: IconButton(
          icon: Icon(Icons.arrow_back, color: Colors.white),
          onPressed: () {},
        ),
      ),
      body: SingleChildScrollView(
        padding: EdgeInsets.all(24.0),
        child: Column(
          crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.center,
          children: [
            Text(
              'Privacy Policy',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 32,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 20),
            Text(
              'This policy outlines our approach to your data.',
              textAlign: TextAlign.center,
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 16,
                color: Colors.grey[300],
                height: 1.5,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 32),
            Text(
              'Data Collection',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 12),
            Text(
              'We collect information like your contact details.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[300],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 32),
            Text(
              'Data Use',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 12),
            Text(
              'Your data enhances our service delivery.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[300],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 32),
            Text(
              'Data Security',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 12),
            Text(
              'We protect your data with strong encryption.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[300],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 32),
            Text(
              'Contact Us',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 20,
                fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
                color: Colors.white,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 12),
            Text(
              'Reach out at support@company.com.',
              style: TextStyle(
                fontSize: 14,
                color: Colors.grey[300],
                height: 1.6,
              ),
            ),
            SizedBox(height: 40),
            Row(
              mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
              children: [
                ElevatedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Accept', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.white)),
                  style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
                    backgroundColor: Colors.blue[300],
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
                SizedBox(width: 12),
                OutlinedButton(
                  onPressed: () {},
                  child: Text('Decline', style: TextStyle(color: Colors.blue[300])),
                  style: OutlinedButton.styleFrom(
                    padding: EdgeInsets.symmetric(horizontal: 24, vertical: 16),
                    side: BorderSide(color: Colors.blue[300]),
                    shape: RoundedRectangleBorder(
                      borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8),
                    ),
                  ),
                ),
              ],
            ),
          ],
        ),
      ),
    );
  }
}
